snippet: The Chicago Cubs put closer Kyuji Fujikawa on the 15-day disabled list with a strained right forearm and called up reliever Rafael Dolis from Class AAA Iowa.
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Cubs put closer Kyuji Fujikawa on the 15-day disabled list with a strained right forearm and called up reliever Rafael Dolis from Class AAA Iowa.

headline.seo: Cubs Put Closer Kyuji Fujikawa on Disabled List
headline.main: Cubs Put Closer Fujikawa on Disabled List
